tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BatchNormalization (
    model_id UUID,
    layer_id UUID,
    batch_mean FLOAT,
    batch_variance FLOAT,
    normalized_mean FLOAT,
    normalized_variance FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE BatchNormalization (
    layer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    gamma FLOAT,
    beta FLOAT,
    mean FLOAT,
    variance FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE NeuralNetwork (
    network_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    layer_id SERIAL,
    neuron_id SERIAL,
    input_value FLOAT,
    output_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE neural_networks (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    batch_normalization_operation VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    layer_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    batch_size INT NOT NULL,
    normalization_factor FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE layers (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    layer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    activation_function VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    input_size INT NOT NULL,
    output_size INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE neurons (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    neuron_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    neuron_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    bias FLOAT NOT NULL,
    weight FLOAT NOT NULL
);
